title: Configuration Backup
description: Configuration backup Workflow based on Resource Types

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This low-code workflow uses AWS SDK integrations to call AWS Config and Amazon S3 APIs when gathering and storing Resource Type specific configuration data, based on the supplied input.
This solution requires an AWS Config Aggregator to already be setup and active.

testing.headline: Testing
text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
